Description:
JOB PURPOSELeads the process engineering discipline activities for the assigned project (greenfield and brownfield scope).
Provide Process Engineering subject matter expertise during Detailed Design /EPC phases of the project.
Ensures that technical requirements (e.g., basis of design, simulations, reports, studies project specifications, data sheets, etc.) developed during FEED fully comply with project requirements. 
General understanding of multi discipline engineering (mechanical/piping/ instrumentation /etc.) and ability to work closely with multidisciplinary teams.Skills
Skills:
Broad and extensive knowledge of:
Oil and gas offshore projects (greenfield and brownfield) Engineering 
In-depth knowledge of Process engineering design
Design standards, specifications, codes, and appropriate safety criteria
Offshore facilities design, construction, and operation.
Bachelor’s or master’s degree in chemical/Process engineering.

Minimum of fifteen (15) years oil and gas process engineering work experience of which a minimum of ten (10 years) of relevant experience and 5 years in the similar position.
International project experience with Tier-1 EPC Contractors or Client, involved in the projects executing large offshore platforms (i.e., greenfield and brownfield work), pipelines and onshore.
Sound knowledge of the project execution process in large-scale project environments (expenditure >US$ 1 Bn).
